title: Successful login with valid credentials
description: Verify that a user can log in successfully using valid credentials and is redirected to the staff dashboard.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid username and password
Submit the login form
Verify the user is authenticated via Supabase and redirected to the staff dashboard
Verify the dashboard displays relevant staff data and interface elements

title: Login failure with invalid credentials
description: Ensure that login attempt with invalid credentials fails and an appropriate error message is displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter invalid username and/or password
Submit the login form
Verify authentication fails and no user session is created
Verify error message is displayed and login form remains visible

title: Role-based access control enforcement
description: Verify that users with different roles have access only to permitted features and pages.

steps.description: Log in as a user with role A
Verify access to dashboard and permitted pages specific to role A
Attempt to access restricted pages for role A
Verify access is denied or redirected appropriately
Switch to a user with role B
Verify access to pages permitted for role B and restrictions enforced

title: Dashboard data loading and display correctness
description: Verify the dashboard page loads properly and displays accurate and relevant staff information.

steps.description: Log in as a staff user
Navigate to the dashboard page
Verify dashboard UI is rendered with correct TailwindCSS styling
Verify relevant operations and data for the staff user are displayed correctly

title: Bottom navigation functionality and consistency
description: Verify the bottom navigation enables access to all key pages and remains consistent across the app.

steps.description: Log in as staff user
Verify bottom navigation is visible and styled per design
Use bottom navigation to access Market Statistics page
Verify Market Statistics page loads and data is displayed
Use bottom navigation to access Leaderboard page
Verify Leaderboard page loads and displays correct rankings
Use bottom navigation to access Staff Services page
Verify Staff Services page loads and allows interaction
Switch between pages multiple times
Verify navigation remains consistent, no broken links, or UI glitches

title: Market Statistics page data accuracy and update
description: Verify that the Market Statistics page displays accurate business insights and updates data in realtime as backend changes.

steps.description: Navigate to Market Statistics page
Verify that statistics data matches expected backend data
Trigger backend data changes (e.g., simulate new data in Supabase)
Verify the statistics page updates to reflect new data without manual refresh

title: Leaderboard view correctness and performance
description: Verify Leaderboard page correctly displays rankings relevant to staff roles and handles large data efficiently.

steps.description: Navigate to Leaderboard page
Verify leaderboard rankings match expected data for the logged in user's role
Simulate large leaderboard data set in backend
Verify the leaderboard renders correctly without performance degradation or UI breakage

title: Staff Services management functionality
description: Ensure the Staff Services page allows users to view, add, edit, and delete staff-related services as per role permissions.

steps.description: Navigate to Staff Services page
Verify existing services are listed correctly
Add a new staff service
Verify new service appears in the list and is saved to backend
Edit an existing staff service
Verify updated information is saved and displayed correctly
Delete a staff service
Verify the service is removed from the list and backend

title: Supabase client connection success
description: Verify the application successfully connects to Supabase backend services for authentication and data retrieval.

steps.description: Start the application and initiate authentication request
Verify Supabase client connects without errors
Perform a data fetch from Supabase (e.g., fetching staff services or statistics)
Verify data is retrieved successfully and reflects current backend state

title: UI styling and visual elements load correctly
description: Verify that all TailwindCSS styles are applied correctly including gradient backgrounds, blurred transparent forms, icon-enhanced inputs, animated background blobs, and styled buttons.

steps.description: Load the login page
Verify gradient backgrounds and blurred transparent form are rendered
Verify icons are present in input fields
Verify animated background blobs are visible and smooth
Verify buttons are styled as per design document

title: UI styling consistency after browser refresh and cache clear
description: Verify that styling issues are fixed upon browser refresh and cache clearing as per validation criteria.

steps.description: Load the app and observe UI styling
Refresh the browser
Verify UI styling is correct post refresh
Clear browser cache and reload the app
Verify all styles including TailwindCSS effects load correctly with no visual glitches

title: User logout functionality
description: Ensure that the user can log out successfully, terminating their session and returning to the login page.

steps.description: Log in as a staff user
Initiate logout from any page
Verify the user session is terminated in Supabase
Verify the user is redirected to the login page

title: Handle backend disconnect or Supabase errors gracefully
description: Verify that if Supabase backend is unavailable or returns errors, the app handles them gracefully and informs the user appropriately.

steps.description: Simulate Supabase backend connection failure or error
Attempt login or data fetch operation
Verify the app displays a meaningful error message to the user
Verify app does not crash and remains responsive
